SELECT count(*) FROM t_work_orders_master
AND document_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{documentNumber},'%')
AND memo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memo},'%')
AND product_idx IN (SELECT idx FROM t_product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%'))
AND supervisor_id IN (SELECT id FROM t_employee WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supervisorName},'%'))
AND work_start_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND work_start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND work_start_date <=STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND is_deleted = #{isDeleted}

SELECT
, p.name AS productName , r.name AS recipeMasterName , e.name AS supervisorName FROM t_work_orders_master wo JOIN t_product p ON wo.product_idx = p.idx JOIN t_recipe_master r ON wo.recipe_master_idx = r.idx LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON wo.supervisor_id = e.id
AND wo.document_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{documentNumber},'%')
AND wo.memo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memo},'%')
AND wo.product_idx IN (SELECT idx FROM t_product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%'))
AND wo.supervisor_id IN (SELECT id FROM t_employee WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supervisorName},'%'))
AND wo.work_start_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND wo.work_start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND wo.work_end_date <=STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND is_deleted = #{isDeleted}
LIMIT #{pageDTO.size} OFFSET #{pageDTO.offset}
